snippet: Derrick Rose, who tore an anterior cruciate ligament in Game 1, could only watch as Philadelphia romped against Chicago, which was outscored, 62-37, in the second half.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Philadelphia 76ers defeat Chicago Bulls, 109-92, to even the Eastern Conference first-round playoff series, 1-1; other NBA news noted.

byline.original: By BEN STRAUSS and HOWARD BECK

lead_paragraph: Derrick Rose, who tore an anterior cruciate ligament in Game 1, could only watch as Philadelphia romped against Chicago, which was outscored, 62-37, in the second half.

headline.seo: Bulls, Playing Without Rose, Lose to 76ers
headline.main: Playing Without Rose, Bulls Lose to 76ers and Series Is Tied
headline.print_headline: Playing Without Rose, Bulls Lose to 76ers and Series Is Tied
